DESCRIPTION.message: この拡張機能は新規タブをメモ代わりにすることができます!

INIT_TEXT.message:
# Welcome to NEW TAB NOTE!!

Thank you for downloading NEW TAB NOTE! 🎉
NEW TAB NOTE a new tab extension for notes 📖
Let's edit by pressing the pencil mark in the upper left!

## Example

### ■ Emphasis
*This text will be italic.*
**This text will be bold.**
*You **can** combine them.*

### ■ Lists

####  Unordered
* Item 1
* Item 2
  * Item 2a
  * Item 2b

#### Ordered
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### ■ Link
[Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions?hl=en&)

### ■ Task Lists
- [ ] Task 1
- [X] Task 2

### ■ Blockquote
> **note**
> element is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

### ■ Code
```
if (isAwesome) {
  return true
}
```

RESUME_EDIT_MESSAGE.message: 編集を再開するにはフィルターを解除してください
